title: Is Lisa the most talented BLACKPINK member? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well first of all i would like to tell that i’m a BLINK and an OT4 … So the question is that …IS LISA THE MOST TALENTED BP MEMBER? So the photo you’re seeing below consist of 4 girls: JISOO, JENNIE , ROSE and LISA.  She’s JISOO, the eldest member of BLACKPINK. She can sing ( with an angelic voice that sounds like heaven), rap (She is not a rapper but when her mate was sick she did her part which was rapping extremely fast) , dance and is called Miss Korea and she’s least famous in the group worldwide but in korea she’s the most famous one ….. ( She IS talented)  She’s JENNIE , the 2nd eldest member in BP she’s the main rapper , can dance like a pro, sing with the most powerful voice and the 2nd visual of BP…… also called YG Princess… is the 2nd worldwide famous member of Bp and also in korea……( She IS talented)  She’s ROSE or ROSIE, the 2nd youngest member of the group.She can sing like a goddess of heaven, Dance as if her body is boneless and her beauty is no joke and is the most stylish member out of them. Is the 2nd least famous member in korea and worldwide BUT … she IS talented. She’s called the goddess of heaven …<3  AND she’s LISA, The maknae of the group. She can sing with a attractive voice , is the lead rapper and main dancer. She’s called royal maknae and Thailand Princess. She’s most famous member worldwide. Is the most followed kpop idol on INSTAGRAM.  ……………………………………. SO your answer is YESS Lisa is talented and jennie, jisoo, rose also. Blackpink is talented not only LISA. I really like lisa cause she’s my bias but the truth is that all of them are equall and talented AF .
